title: WordWise
description: An AI-powered language learning assistant that helps users expand their vocabulary through contextual learning.
fullDescription: WordWise is an innovative language learning application developed during Week 1 of the Gauntlet AI intensive program. It leverages advanced natural language processing to analyze text in real-time, providing instant definitions, translations, and usage examples. The app features personalized learning recommendations, progress tracking with spaced repetition, and context-aware word definitions to help users effectively expand their vocabulary.
